chart.title: Share of births by age of mother
chart.subtitle: Estimated share of total births by the age of the mother.

Share of births by mothers aged 10-19.titleLong: Share of births by mothers aged 10-19 - UN WPP
Share of births by mothers aged 10-19.descriptionShort: Number of births recorded annually, based on the civil calendar year, spanning from January 1 to December 31.
